thread.section_title: Buddha-Bar Hotel Paris - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Excellent in everyway
thread.title_full: Excellent in everyway - Review of Buddha-Bar Hotel Paris, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Mass L
title: Excellent in everyway
text: Everything was perfect. Hotel staff was very nice. Helped me book all my dinners and activities. Did everything I asked for and in quick time. Food was very nice. And we were a little bit late for breakfast everyday but they didn't mind. My room was exceptional and the bed was reasonably comfortable.! Would definitely stay again
